meanings.sent1: She carefully refolds the letter to put it back in the envelope.
meanings.sent2: After reading the note, she refolds it neatly and places it on the table.
meanings.sent3: He refolds the paper so many times, it starts to look like a tiny accordion.
meanings.sent4: The origami artist refolds the paper with precision, creating intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: With a gentle touch, she refolds the delicate fabric to avoid any creases.

meanings.sent1: He refolds the map to show the starting point again.
meanings.sent2: The old man refolds the letter, reminiscing about the past.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully refolds the corner of the blanket with its paw.
meanings.sent4: The memories refold in her mind, bringing back the emotions of that day.
meanings.sent5: The wind refolds the fallen leaves, creating a swirling dance on the ground.

meanings.definition: To fold in a different way
meanings.sent1: She refolds the scarf into a stylish knot around her neck.
meanings.sent2: The chef refolds the pastry dough to create a flaky texture.
meanings.sent3: The magician refolds the card in a surprising manner, leaving the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: The artist refolds the canvas, transforming the painting into a new masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The tailor refolds the fabric, revealing a hidden pattern underneath.
